attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The G8 have the power to abolish poverty but they wont if we dont apply pressure on them. on average a child living in poverty dies every 3 seconds, and people who live on the streets are ignored by the community and are starving and have no parents to comfort the. we can make a difference so please sifn my petition and MAKE POVERTY HISTORY.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
